EmailTemplate.name: 10-20-22 DBNK Accelerate Magazine V2 Issue 3 Email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Uncover expert insights on payments, crypto, financial wellness and more
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The current economic climate is impacting everything from consumer buying power and financial health to payments and crypto strategies. It can feel like a full-time job to keep up. Explore the new issue of NCR’s Accelerate <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/accelerate-magazine-v2-issue3?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_September_AccelerateMagV2-Issue3_DigitalBanking&utm_content=Email2&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> digital magazine for insights and perspectives on these topics and more from our partners and industry experts. And read NCR customer success stories related to financial wellness, business digital banking and building a better digital-first bank. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
